p: The following materials were used for the preparation of the recycled α-Fe 2O 3 and the α-Fe 2O 3/OPEFB/PCL nanocomposites: Mill scale flakes (Perwaja Sdn. Bhd. Terengganu, Malaysia), Polycaprolactone (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA) 97.0% purity, density 1.146 g/cm 3, Purified OPEFB (Dengkil, Malaysia) ground into 100 μm grain size.
